overview: Our world, the only known place where life exists, is a tiny speck in this vast universe. When we realize that, this is the only family we have, all the differences like boundaries, religions, colours and languages that divide us, vanish and we attain Saakshatkaaram, the realisation. Saakshatkaaram is about the inner journey of a pious Hindu man, mourning his wife’s death and his search for finding redemption. He decides to meet a Muslim family from a foreign country; only because his wife’s hands now belong to one of them and are alive!
title: Saakshatkaaram
